contentList.content: A magical light follows your every move.
Allow the Candlelight spell to fade.
A creature you touch is cleansed of all dirt and grime. The target regains [1], and has advantage on Charisma checks.
Your force of will moves any nearby object a short distance away.
This creature has disadvantage on Perception checks.
You cause a song, thought, or story to get stuck in a single creature within range's head. For the duration of the spell, the creature has disadvantage on Perception rolls.
A creature that you can see, within 10ft, takes [1].
Magical ice encrusts your weapon, causing its attack to deal Cold damage.
The Target begins to feel unnaturally cold. Unless they are resistant to cold damage, they will become chilled and distracted, giving them disadvantage on Perception checks.
Your hands become unnaturally warm. You may touch someone to deal [1]. The target also loses the Chilled status, if they already had it.
